name: 招魂记
description:
This game is a simple RPG game,

The player is responsible for playing a young necromancer

Real experience of the growth process of the Little Necromancer on the road of summoning souls

To what extent can the character ultimately grow?

It's entirely up to you!

Game gameplay:

When you open your eyes and want to explore the outer continent, your guards will ask you to consult your father. Once you obtain permission, you can embark on the exploration journey!



Operation method:

Walking: ↑↓←→ (keyboard)

Conversation: Enter

Item column: Esc

Game features:

Classic RPG game, let you linger back and forth!

With exciting character stories as the background, we have portrayed an extraordinary legendary life for players!

The game's art style is simple and lively, and the image quality design is exquisite!
